name: Can You Escape Fate? An Escape the Room game inspired by Undertale
name_original: Can You Escape Fate? An Escape the Room game inspired by Undertale
description:
Welcome to Can You Escape Fate! It's heavily inspired by Undertale, and there are lots of references if you can find them! It features a long original story, and should be a lot of fun! I've incorporated a lot of new attacks and story elements too!

THE STORY:
When your brother mysteriously goes missing in 2016, it's your job to go back and find him, no matter what the cost. You just finished the Year of the Monkey, and you have the choice to leave or stay to find out the truth behind your own past.

Explore a land devoid of life and stuck in the past with lingering New Years Resolutions to uncover the truth behind the world and yourself. Avoid blood-thirsty claw machines, failed lab experiments, greedy spirits, and befriend insane yandere souls in exhilarating bullet hell boss battles!

Can You Escape Fate is a unique and fresh take on the bullet hell and escape the room genre, merging them together into an unforgettable experience that will take you under the tale of two siblings and the New Year. Armed with only your own heart and SOUL, survive the unmerciful and cruel world of 2016. You are the only one who can change your life. How far will you go to change your fate? Can you escape?

GAMEPLAY:
Fight your way through boss battles and avoid getting hit using your mouse! Dodge obstacles and enemies! Play through an immersive storyline that will take you through a roller coaster of emotions and action adventure! Set time back in motion and resume the Zodiac Cycle by fighting your way to the New Year!

FEATURES:
16+ battles, all unique and feature
50+ different attacks. Innovative Bullet hell gameplay never seen before!
13 enemies to defeat or befriend
An all new arcade mode where you can fight all the bosses head on
6 Worlds to explore and episodes to unlock! Escape the Room style.
Many secrets and mysteries to solve!
6 Different Endings to find!
CHALLENGE your friends to fight for the number one spot on the leaderboards! See how you stack up against the world! (mobile only)

DOWNLOAD THE GAME FOR MOBILE DEVICES HERE for FREE! Android:https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=air.com.jcsoft.canyouescapefate
iOS: https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/can-you-escape-fat...

Note: Look forward to new characters and more endings in future updates!

Also, let me know if you have any concerns/see any bugs!
